subject: Creativity
title: How Real People Talk: Dialogue Isn't Speech
description: Learn How Real People Talk: Dialogue Isn't Speech in one minute.

hook.text: Record a real conversation and transcribe it. It's full of 'um,' repetitions, and dead ends.

buildup.text: Good dialogue SOUNDS natural but ISN'T. It's carefully crafted to feel real while doing work that real speech never.

discovery.text: Every line of dialogue must do at least one of three things: reveal character, advance plot, or create tension.

twist.text: Elmore Leonard said: 'If it sounds like writing, I rewrite it.

climax.text: Aaron Sorkin's dialogue sounds rapid and natural but is meticulously rhythmic ‚Äî it's closer to music than to speech.

punchline.text: Great dialogue isn't realistic speech. It's a better version of it.

quiz.question: What must every line of good dialogue do?
options: Reveal character, advance plot, or create tension
